verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Jingle bells, jingle bells, newline Jingle all the way, newline Oh what fun it is to ride, newline In a one horse open sleigh. newline Jingle bells, jingle bells, newline Jingle all the way, newline Oh what fun it is to ride, newline In a one horse open sleigh.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Dashing through the snow, newline In a one horse open sleigh, newline O'er the fields we go, newline Laughing all the way, newline Bells on bobtail ring, newline Making spirits bright. newline What fun it is to ride and sing, newline A sleighing song tonight.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: Ring the bells, ring the bells newline Ring them out today. newline Echoing through all the world newline Listen what they say newline Ring the bells, ring the bells newline Ring them all the way. newline Spread the message far and wide newline That Christ is born today.
